columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the domain.

columns.name: asset_size_bytes
columns.description: The total size of all assets in the domain.

columns.name: created_time
columns.description: A timestamp that contains the date and time the domain was created.

columns.name: encryption_key
columns.description: The key used to encrypt the domain.

columns.name: owner
columns.description: The 12-digit account number of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the domain. It does not include dashes or spaces.

columns.name: repository_count
columns.description: The number of repositories in the domain.

columns.name: s3_bucket_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon S3 bucket that is used to store package assets in the domain.

columns.name: status
columns.description: A string that contains the status of the domain.

columns.name: policy
columns.description: An CodeArtifact resource policy that contains a resource ARN, document details, and a revision.

columns.name: policy_std
columns.description: Contains the contents of the resource-based policy in a canonical form for easier searching.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the resource.
